SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into s_forum (title, user_id, content, types, addition_status, addition_id, add_time, floors) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floors,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update s_forum set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addition_status = #{additionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addition_id = #{additionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floors = #{floors,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, user_id, content, types, addition_status, addition_id, add_time, floors from s_forum where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, title, user_id, content, types, addition_status, addition_id, add_time, floors from s_forum
